replies.body:
White Fatalis, Dalamadur, and Akantor.

There are scarier things.
GREEN plesioths, people complaining about  hitboxes in lol have never faced 40 minutes of hydropump only to be hipchecked from across the map when the damn thing leaves the water
I can't drown the demons, they know how to swim.

Water combat in general is fucking nightmare fuel.
Also, egg quests. Fucking egg quests.
Barioth egg quest tops them all !

Unbear-ioth...

I'll show myself out now
I like you had the perfect username for this comment.
those dual blades would not win. Sorry.

How to survive zombie apocalypse:
break into middle ages history museum. Steal armor suit and sword. Now you never have to worry about being bitten or running out of bullets.

they are super human humanoids, from a postapocalyptic earth where they genetically engineered animals. So its also likely that humans were genetically engineered to fight them like you do in the game

idk there are some pretty ridiculous weapons in MH.

switch axes, great swords, and charge blades come to my mind.
especially how broken the charge blade was back in mh4u. You block and nuke things.
